General Utilities¶

General raster utilities are gathered in rasterTools.RasterTools

class rasterTools.RasterTools[source]¶

General tools for raster computations.

Methods

aspect_richdem(raster[, verbose]) Compute the aspect of a DEM via richDEM
curvature_richdem(raster[, verbose]) Compute the curvature of a DEM via richDEM
plane_curvature_richdem(raster[, verbose]) Compute the curvature of a DEM via richDEM
profile_curvature_richdem(raster[, verbose]) Compute the curvature of a DEM via richDEM
slope_richdem(raster[, verbose, method]) Compute a slope map of a DEM via richDEM
classmethod aspect_richdem(raster, verbose=False)[source]¶

Compute the aspect of a DEM via richDEM

Parameters:
  • raster – DEM
  • verbose – flag to show a figure of the result or not (default False)

Further information in richdem.

Returns: aspect map
Return type: np.array

Compute the curvature of a DEM via richDEM

Parameters:
  • raster – DEM
  • verbose – flag to show a figure of the result or not (default False)

Further information in richdem.

Returns: curvature map
Return type: np.array

  • verbose – flag to show a figure of the result or not (default False)

Compute the curvature of a DEM via richDEM

  • verbose – flag to show a figure of the result or not (default False)

Returns: profile curvature map
Return type: np.array
classmethod slope_richdem(raster, verbose=False, method='slope_riserun')[source]¶

Compute a slope map of a DEM via richDEM

Parameters:
  • raster – DEM
  • verbose – flag to show a figure of the result or not (default False)
  • method – the method according to which the slope is computed: - ‘slope_riserun’ - ‘slope_precentage’ - ‘slope_degrees’ - ‘slope_radians’

Further information in richdem.

Returns: slope map
Return type: np.array
